links.title: Elon Musk is the most cautious CEO in tech, according to IBM's supercomputer
links.description: While Musk scored an impressive 0.96, Cisco CEO Chuck Robbins was very close with a score of 0.95. Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella and Oracle's Larry Ellison followed with scores of 0.91. The least cautious CEOs are Alphabet's Larry Page and Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg, who are tied at 0.73.

links.title: Investors face a long, hard road back to 'normal'
links.description: By Getting back to normal was never going to be easy. Investors and policy makers got a reminder of that this week as European Central Bank President Mario Draghi and other central bankers sent signals that reiterated that the era of extraordinarily easy monetary policy will eventually run out.

$TSLA https://www.bloomberg.com/amp/news/articles/2017-06-28/china-is-about-to-bury-elon-musk-in-batteries

links.title: China Is About to Bury Elon Musk in Batteries
links.description: As Elon Musk races to finish building the world's biggest battery factory in the Nevada desert, China is poised to leave him in the dust. Chinese companies have plans for additional factories with the capacity to pump out more than 120 gigawatt-hours a year by 2021, according to a report published this week by Bloomberg Intelligence.
